project.name: 2k games
project.blurb: I did some development work on the 2K Games site while freelancing at Rokkan. Winner of FWA Site of The Day, this was a most challenging project. After a lot of blood sweat and tears we were able to launch. Being an avid gamer myself added a little something special to seeing this go live.

project.name: Starwood Hotels Luxury Collection
project.blurb: Winner of Adobe Site of the Day, this was the first large project that I was tasked at developing alone on the Flash side. I was able to work with the tightly knit back end team at Starwood, and we were able to knock this one out of the park.
